description: Failed adverse possession - use was not open and notorious
facts: Grace has secretly used an underground cellar on neighbor's property
She has used it for storage for 25 years
The entrance is hidden and the owner never knew
Her use has been continuous and without permission
asp_facts: claim(c6). claimant(c6, grace). property_type(c6, land). occupation_years(c6, 25). occupation_continuous(c6, yes). occupation_open(c6, no). occupation_hostile(c6, yes). taxes_paid(c6, no). statutory_period(c6, 15).
question: Has Grace acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: Adverse possession requires open and notorious possession - the use must be visible enough that a reasonable owner would discover it. Grace's secret use of a hidden cellar fails this requirement.
